description: This file defines a React context for managing a light/dark theme and provides a provider component and a hook for consuming the context. It handles theme toggling, persistence using localStorage, and applies the theme class to the document root.

methods.name: ThemeProvider
methods.description: React component providing theme context to children, managing theme state, persisting it, and applying corresponding class to document root.

methods.name: useTheme
methods.description: Custom hook to access theme context, throws error if used outside ThemeProvider.
